website_summaries.verdict: This makeup setting, hydrating face spray is an affordable yet highly effective option that’s easy to use on a day-to-day basis.
pros: This will help set makeup and hydrate face for a long period of time – up to 12 hours
Easy to throw in bag and use on-the-go
Boasts the perk of prohibiting makeup smudges
Simple to spray all over face or just in desired areas

customer_reviews.title: the product works super well! My sister bought me the more expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: The price is right and most importantly, the product works super well! My sister bought me the more expensive urban decay setting spray as a gift and it doesn't even compare. The urban decay I found still allowed my eyeliner and mascara to run within a few hrs and it also felt sticky all over my face. To be fair, I am one of those people, that no matter waterproof or whatnot, make up just runs off my face... Sad... and yet, this cheap little prodcut has been able to keep my face brand new all day! Granted, it also feels sticky when I spray it on but after a few mns, that feeling disappears so would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: I. marin

customer_reviews.title: Held up in the humidity and heat down south, so I'm sold!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I am in love! I live in the south, where it's hot and humid right now. I sweat a lot too. I put on a full face of makeup, and walked to the store. Ordinarily, my foundation would have melted like butter, and I'd have lines everywhere. My husband kept confirming that despite sweating, my makeup was staying put. I just got home and checked? You can see the sweat on my face, but other than looking like I need a bit of powder, nothing budged! I have oily skin in spots too, but that hasn't affected me tonight! I'll definitely keep buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to try a makeup setting spray but was reluctant because it seemed the highest rated ones were really pricey. I read a recommendation for this product by a poster on another blog and figured it was worth trying. I have really oily skin and in the Mojave Desert heat, my makeup was a mess by lunchtime at work. Now it holds for the entire day, and still looks reasonably fresh by 5PM. I'm delighted with the results--so much so that I'm ordering another bottle to give to a friend to try. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Helped my makeup last longer, but not all night long.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time at a wedding last night and comparing photos of my makeup from before we left until mid-way through the wedding shows that this product works, as my makeup still looked good! By the very end of the evening (7 hours and lots of dancing later), my eye makeup was smudgy and my lipstick color was faded, so I didn't get the same amazing results as some of the other posters, which is why I only gave 4 stars. I did not experience any issues with skin breakout from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: As good as expensive setting sprays...
customer_reviews.text: ...if not better. I love how lightweight and cooling this is, and it sprays in a very fine mist that settles gently on the face without feeling wet or sticky. I use it when I first apply my makeup, to get rid of the excess powder on my face after I've set my foundation. But its also perfect for refreshing your makeup halfway through the day, and its heavenly on a hot, sticky summer day. And you absolutely cannot beat the price. E.L.F. proves that you don't have to pay a fortune for high quality cosmetics; most of their original line is under $5! Do yourself a favor and check them out!
customer_reviews.author: Leo LeonardTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: A nice, basic setting spray for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with elf. How do they offer such great products at such a low cost? I’ve heard a few makeup artists say the same. In particular, Wayne Goss compares their white shadow to a higher-end one and he concluded that they’re practically the same quality! Same goes for this spray. That’s when I started buying elf products and I’ve been very satisfied!!! Plus, they’re a San Francisco, CA company!
customer_reviews.author: Allie H

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I'm going out and putting a lot of makeup I end up spraying this on my face, and it has worked for me. Also, before makeup I put on the primer of ELF too and they both work great.
customer_reviews.author: Clawd

customer_reviews.title: A good setting mist
customer_reviews.text: I am a little behind the times with makeup, so this is the first setting product I have tried. The price was great and the offer was for 2 bottles; there didn't seem a reason to not try. I've used it and it seems to work. The whole "misting" feeling makes me feel like maybe some parts of my face get it more than others, but I haven't noticed makeup disappearing from certain slots, so I'm assuming it's fine. The true test will be the Florida summer, so my review may change.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy39Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This makeup mist is affordable and gives satisfactory results. I don;t live in a very hot place so I don;t know if it hold up in humidity, but I think it gives a lot of other benefits such as moisturizing a dry and thirsty face. It's nice in the summer as a cooling mist if you refrigerate it. It's useful for misting even if you are not wearing makeup. Spraying this gives me a dewy look. I think it's most useful for toning down dryness if you accidentally caked on too much foundation or powder. The fluid is unscented, and didn't break me out. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra tu

customer_reviews.title: ... all kinds of setting sprays from more expensive brands like Urban Decay and cheaper ones like NYX and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used all kinds of setting sprays from more expensive brands like Urban Decay and cheaper ones like NYX and this is by far the best I've used!! Usually the sprays will say "matte" or "oil control", but don't live up to that and almost produce a shine. This spray is NOT like that at all! Zero shine, doesn't look oily, and produces a healthy glow, not looking greasy or oily. Can't beat the quality nor the price!! I found my go to spray!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: She’s a Keeper! - Definite Repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. First of all it comes in great packaging. Typical for elf. The spray itself was sealed so you can be sure you’re getting all your product. Compared to other setting sprays it didn’t have an overwhelming scent and I didn't feel any discomfort on my face when I sprayed it on. I used it to set my final look but I also use it to set my base foundation. And this product kept my making looking fresh the WHOLE day. It gave me confidence throughout my day. My concealer didn’t run down my face at all, which is a problem I usually face have oily/combination skin. Definitely would buy the product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works just as well as many more expensive products!
customer_reviews.text: If you prefer to set your makeup with a mist setter, then this product works as good as most out there for a fraction of the cost! I cannot say enough good things about ELF products because of their price point, but also the quality has never disappointed. I buy a lot of makeup products because I like having options and ELF allows me to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This setting spray is great and really does set my makeup
customer_reviews.text: This setting spray is great and really does set my makeup. The only caveat of this product is that you really have to douse your face to see results. My face really has to be wet, almost dripping. Which is really kind of a bummer considering the bottle is quite small, so if you do your makeup every day, you will need to repurchase quite frequently. Other than that, this setting spray will extend my makeup wear time by several hours and it is still quite cheap compared to the higher end setting sprays on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and usually can only use Mac products. The setting spray for Mac is just so expensive so I decided to try this out. I have not had any kind of skin reaction and it seems to work just as well as Mac setting spray
customer_reviews.author: TFab

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but bottle is small
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works, and I don't know why it tooke so long to discover it. My face looks radiant hours later. I do find that sometimes I have to reapply blush, but it might be in part due to applying less in the first place due to still being hot from the shower and also sometimes I perspire a little ony face with heavy activity or weather. I only wonder how long thus tiny bottle will last. I'd like a 12 oz. bottle for $10 instead.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMomHikerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Is this just one of those products created for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Is this just one of those products created for the sake of money because I do not remember my make up remaining in place when I sprayed this stuff on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but am happy with this so far
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, but am happy with this so far. It seems to hold my makeup in place until I take it off at the end of the day, but I also work in an office. This is what I currently use makeup-wise, so it might depend on what type of foundation/powders you wear on whether it will work for you. It's cheap enough, so give it a try! :-) IT Cosmetics CC Cream Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind Eraser Dark Circles Treatment IT Costmetics Bye Bye Pores Powder Milani Bronzer Milani Baked Blush Elf Baked Highlighter
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Weakland

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting an alternative to buying my more expensive spray but this def changed my mind, in a negative way. I will gladly spend $10 more and get a better spray. This stuff smells horrible and doesn’t set my makeup at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sharla Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try, you'll be surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on a whim. I was looking for a primer to help my makeup from basically sliding on my face. Before, within a couple of hours of application, I'd have raccoon eyes from my eyeliner and mascara. This product does a great job of keeping things in place. Very little, if any, eye makeup movement. And now, when I get home after a 10 hour day, I can actually just feel that there is enough makeup left to need to wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Baggarley

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff and it really works well for the price. You don't feel sticky after spraying this, and it doesn't have an unsettling smell. I also like how much use I will get out of this product. It only takes me about 2-3 sprays per use, and I can't even tell a dent in the liquid after using this product a couple of times. Everyone wants their makeup to stay all day, and this product helps you achieve that. I'd say it's just as good as higher-priced alternatives for sale now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cox

customer_reviews.title: The perfect finisher
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this makeup mist, while on the search for something to help with my makeup and oily skin. When my package arrived I was satisfied with the size of the bottle, small enough to fit in my purse. After observation of the product size, I decided to give it a test. My results were proved to be successful at maintaining my make up and even giving me a glow. I love this setting spray. I'm definitely going to buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Taneka

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works well, but it comes in a spray bottle that sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: affordable, does the job. Dislikes: the spray bottle it comes in is subpar. It doesn't produce a fine-enough spray to evenly distribute the makeup setting fluid. its more like it sends big drops of the "spray" on your face, which I feel doesn't provide the desired coverage. I suppose you could order it and transfer it into another spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Juno

customer_reviews.title: Broken Bottle, but product works relatively well.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was leaking when I opened the package. I cleaned it off and thought it might be okay, but it still leaked from the cap when I went to use it. I plan on pouring the content into a different spray bottle to use the product. It sprayed on a little unevenly - there was mist and also bigger droplets that took longer to dry on my face. Not sure if I just had a broken bottle. Once it dried it felt very comfortable, though. I am new to using setting spray, so I can't really compare it to other sprays, but it seems to do it's job okay (compared to nothing).
customer_reviews.author: Rozuki

customer_reviews.title: Great product, broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this setting spray and I love that it works so wonderfully while still being affordable. I only gave it 4 stars because the spray nozzle is defective on the one I received and I will have to put it in a different spray bottle to use it. But considering the low price I'm not too upset about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kalina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using any makeup setters and I am so happy I finally got some. This definitely keeps the makeup on and around my nose in place. I'm usually red around there and find my makeup is wearing off around midday, but with this my nose is less greasy and I don't need to touch up my makeup as much. A little powder around noon and I'm good to go into the night! Eye makeup stays put very well too - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luma

customer_reviews.title: it shoots out like a cleaning spray
customer_reviews.text: The spray function is much too strong. Instead of being able to lightly mist this, it shoots out like a cleaning spray, then I have to try to use a brush to evenly dissipate the product. In terms of keeping makeup set better, I honestly haven't noticed a difference. It feels refreshing but could achieve the same effect with a water mist.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: This worked awesome to keep my fancy Halloween makeup looking perfect all ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim after hearing about how well setting spray works to keep makeup on your face. Turns out they were right. This worked awesome to keep my fancy Halloween makeup looking perfect all night long. It even smells nice. I now recommend this to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: ashley greer

customer_reviews.title: As good if not better than Urban Decay!
customer_reviews.text: My nail technician told me about E.L.F products one day so I decided to try a few! Wow! I am so impressed with this makeup mist! It has helped my makeup stay put all day and evening. It has a pleasant odor and feel to your skin. Some products like this will break out your skin and this one absolutely does not. I have purchased this many times and given to my friends. I have used others in the past and I think this one is as good if not better than the setting spray from Urban Decay at a fraction of the cost. Try it and you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexia C. Hamric

customer_reviews.title: well i did like this product
customer_reviews.text: Okay, well i did like this product. It didnt seem to work perfectly for one the bottle doesnt spary its squirts so i recommend getting a new spray bottle from the dollar store and pour it in. Second is it has a weird smell its not awful but weird but its not so bad to were you cant handle it though.
customer_reviews.author: nymeria k

customer_reviews.title: product this is a pretty decent in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: For a e.i.f. product this is a pretty decent in my opinion. I have used a set by urban decay before and MAC which they are also great but much more expensive. e.i.f.'s version doesn't seem to last as long as those higher end products but for an occasion or daily use it is pretty good. Light and hasn't caused any irritation for me or anyone else I've done make up for so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: so i figured i would try one and i love this I love all the e
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a set mist, so i figured i would try one and i love this I love all the e.l.f. products. i feel it does help. it is kind of small and doesn't have a smell, like water with a hint of something but cant tell. just be careful about spaying it. test it out on your arm first. spray it at least 1 foot away from your face.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ives

customer_reviews.title: ... to go with this because of the price and good reviews. This stuff works really good
customer_reviews.text: I'm very new to makeup so I decided to go with this because of the price and good reviews. This stuff works really good. I use Clinique Beyond Perfecting 2 in 1, a beauty blender and alittle lotion added to my foundation (no primer). I spray this on once I finish everything. From what I've experienced it makes my foundation look like skin. It takes away that dry look some foundations gives you. It also feels so refreshing to have on my face. I love this product but because I'm new to makeup I want to try something new but I have a feeling I'm going to be coming back for this stuff. :D
customer_reviews.author: Malena Gholson

customer_reviews.title: Works great to set my foundation
customer_reviews.text: Works great to set my foundation. I use it BEFORE applying finishing powder and it leaves my skin/makeup looking dewy and fresh. At first I tried using it as the final step, on top of everything and did not like the look it left at all.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t noticed any benefit to using this. But it feels good to spray it on my face lol
customer_reviews.author: TraeTrae

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was half empty and scratched. Not even worth returning for the price. Headed to the drugstore to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and this spray did nothing to keep my makeup from sliding off my face after a few hours. I wanted to like it, but it just didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: I don't notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for awhile now and haven't really noticed any difference between using it and not using it. It was for the ad on price around $2.41 so at least I didn't spend a lot of money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: Great Value great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this setting spray is Affordable and it does the job even better than the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: janette

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. I was using Tarte setting spray but it was expensive in my opinion, so I wanted to try something more reasonable. I came across this e.l.f setting spray for a great price and decided to try it. It makes my makeup last all day. I am please with the product except the smell is sorta like chemical, I just try not to breath it in. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Its definitely does ita job but when I spray it ...
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely does ita job but when I spray it if I breath in within the first 10 seconds it hurts my throat and lungs. So it does make me question the ingredients but I will only use it once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Time

customer_reviews.title: Great Setting Spray!
customer_reviews.text: e.l.f mist and set is a great setting spray. It sprays on lightly but still gets the job done - my makeup lasts all day. My only complaint is that the bottle doesn't last very long in comparison to some of the other setting sprays out there (like femme couture "get locked" from Sally's). However, at the price, it doesn't really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: a great final step in the make up process
customer_reviews.text: Ive never tried a product like this before, but I find that I really like it and that it works as advertised. At the end of the day my makeup is still mostly in place ( I say mostly because if I take a nap or rub at my face a lot then of course Im just screwing it up myself and removing make up). But I now use this every morning and am pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I had been using another brand for make up setting mist but for the price I thought I would give this a try. I see that you get what you pay for. This not only didn't set my make up well, it broke me out. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: HrnyhairyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the formula! This formula is a very wet thick and made my make up run!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Potter

customer_reviews.title: NOT SURE
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this spray. It could be like just using a spray bottle of water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very wet going on messing up my make up. Wasted purchase. Used like three times
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S

customer_reviews.title: Works and will continue to use. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I think this helps with extending the life of my makeup during the day. It did a lot better than I thought it would considering I live in Phoenix, AZ where the heat gets up in the triple digits!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Quintero

customer_reviews.title: All Time Favorite Beauty Product
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this a 6th star. I have oily skin and this was a life saver. Even in the hot Texas summer my make-up stays perfectly in place. A very light odor, and no stickiness. Truly one of my all time favorite beauty products. It works with every foundation, gives a soft, flawless finish, and has earned a permanent spot in my make-up bag
customer_reviews.author: CollegeDormLife

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Makes your face glow a bit but doesn't really appear to increase the life of your makeup. I used this for from and I don't think it really works all that well. I think it does it's best for the cost though. I had to switch the bottle because the original bottles spray is sort of weird.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: It works, but don't use it before your mascara dries. I ended up with "weird freckles below your eyes" as my friend's 2 year old put it. Stays well, maybe a re-apply after work/before date night to help everything along.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn in Training

customer_reviews.title: ... & a leg on setting spray so a friend recommended e. l
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend an arm & a leg on setting spray so a friend recommended e.l.f. I am satisfied with the product. I do not use a lot of make up so I can't fully judge how well it is with transferring. I wear a light powder foundation and I do not have any transfer issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Taglieri

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: Looks great after 12 hour shift in ER my go to
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I like this
customer_reviews.text: I like this setting spray. It made my makeup last all day, was not oily, and makes my skin look dewy (which I like). The only thing is, while you are spraying if you squeeze your eyes shut too hard it will make your mascara go onto your cheek. So let it dry good before you move your face too much! :P Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rip

customer_reviews.title: Where's my spray..EMPTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Would like to give -0 stars since. Since I got a sealed empty package!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Ulvano

customer_reviews.title: This is a YES
customer_reviews.text: I like that this setting spray because there is little to no fragrance, it is great for sensitive skin, and it sets my makeup for at least 8 hours. Good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in the Crowd

customer_reviews.title: I tried using this, since i do sweat throughout ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this, since i do sweat throughout the day (have to do some heavy lifting at work sometimes). My makeup still smears, and this nearly always makes a lash mark above my eye, even if i didnt get moist that day. Not very helpful for my heavy duty needs
customer_reviews.author: PugGod

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it twice now and it kinda works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it to be soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like it to be soft and easy to use ... But I expected it to be a little firmer, but it's fine, it's nice, it feels good. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Deby

customer_reviews.title: Thank God
customer_reviews.text: This product is a God send! I used this at 8am before going to work and my makeup was still stuck on my face at 6pm after our Grand Opening. I was sweating like a pig from running around before, during, and after as well as touching a rubbing my face. You wouldn't have been able to tell I was sweating or rubbing my face.
customer_reviews.author: Stiener

customer_reviews.title: It's literally like squirting yourself in the face with a bottle of ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not come out in a mist. It's literally like squirting yourself in the face with a bottle of cleaner. It works fine to help makeup stay on but I had to spritz my face and then smooth it out because there were literal drops of liquid on it. I'm going back to Fix Plus.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: The mist is a bit weak, so it needs ...
customer_reviews.text: The mist is a bit weak, so it needs to be sprayed much closer to the face than other mists.
customer_reviews.author: Elysa

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love using this setting spray not only because it's cheap, but it's lasting. I spray this on in the morning before heading out for the day and when I come home my makeup is still on and hasn't melted away! I also like using this in the summer time when the humidity is out of control. It is great when it comes to making your face feel refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: This product is FULL of parabens and the "green tea" ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is FULL of parabens and the "green tea" and "Aloe" are so far down the ingredients list they're basically irrelevant. The bottle also leaked while on it's way through the mail and it leaves a very sticky, slimy residue - it makes me not even want to try using it on my face.
customer_reviews.author: arreis325

customer_reviews.title: Smell isn't my favorite, but over all really good.
customer_reviews.text: When I use this spray it sets my makeup into my face well, I do get a little greasy looking after a while but that's probably just my skin type. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: You could probably get it for less in the store but there is nothing like the convenience of shopping from home
customer_reviews.text: This is the first make-up setter that I have tried. I read a few online beauty reviews saying that this worked well and was cheap. You could probably get it for less in the store but there is nothing like the convenience of shopping from home :-) Keeps my make-up from wearing off throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Zimee70

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have never used anything like this before, but as love this product. It adds moisture and does set your makeup. Combining it with the elf moisturizing primer, I can really tell a bug difference in how natural my foundation looks. I am liking the elf products and their prices
customer_reviews.author: Codabug1

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a believer, but I AM NOW! This is a product to buy. You pay for a very good product. I sweat a lot, so makeup for me is something that I never had before this mist. Gotta say, that it worked, IT WORKED! I that sweat like a pig, that my eyeliner got smudge out because Im sweating like there is no tomorrow, yes. IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Nemelle

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: It feels really good in the skin and the vendor is very responsible.
customer_reviews.author: Ily

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pairing with the elf setting powder. I wouldn't use just this because it does set and can become shiny in a squeaky clean way. Not in an oily way. Still good stuff. I usually wet the brush and dab rather than spraying all over. Quite refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!! Had an outdoor wedding and my makeup ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great!! Had an outdoor wedding and my makeup always melted. Thought I'd give this a try and WOW wish I had known about this years ago
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but my skin didn't like it. I was constantly itchy on my face unfortunately. But product does what it should. Do not recommend for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Can't see much of a difference before or after
customer_reviews.text: Honestly can't tell a difference after I put it on. The spraying mechanism doesn't allow it to come out as a fine spray, it is similar to the way windex is dispensed. Needs to go on more even.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the mist for two weeks now and it doesn't seem to be setting my make-up. My foundation wipes off just as it did before I started using setting spray. I may go back to Sephora's product even though it's pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Zeph

customer_reviews.title: I wondered if I would like this product
customer_reviews.text: I wondered if I would like this product, but after several weeks and especially with airplane travel, etc....I will order again. It just makes your makeup hold and look nice! A great product at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Pinterest Lady

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This really is an amazing product. I bought it for my girlfriend and she loved it. Living down south with the heat and humidity being unbearable we were surprised when it actually kept the makeup on all day without the heat and sweat causing it to drip. She's thinking of using it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindred Town

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not an all nighter, but good 5hrs makeup doesn’t budge.
customer_reviews.author: Aifos

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these. I always wait until they are the ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. I always wait until they are the same price as at the store ($3). I stocked up on 2 this time which is good because the price went up again. Difficult to know when they will drop again. I like the fine mist and like to use it especially during warmer weather and dry winter conditions too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Teien

customer_reviews.title: Dry Skin's Worst Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I gave it two stars because I guess my foundation stayed all day. But, you wouldn't be able to tell through the terrible dry skin this caused! I have normal type skin that I wash and moisturize regularly. As soon as I started using this, it felt so tight and dry, and flaked like a snowstorm. As soon as I stopped, my skin was fine. Plus it smells bad at first
customer_reviews.author: Cheerchick1944

customer_reviews.title: Powerful hold
customer_reviews.text: This is the only setting spray I've ever bought and I don't think I'll ever change. It is strong stuff. But sometimes makes me look a bit plastic-y
customer_reviews.author: Ally Stage

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I don't spray this directly on my face or heavily. I just spray a little in front of my face and move threw it like a perfume and it works great. I like to use my powder before I use this so my makeup could last 3 days if I didn't sleep (So I wouldn't smear it on my pillow while I sleep). The bottle is a great size for traveling it could fit in just about any makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Harris

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is first time trying a setting spray and I bought it with the elf mineral infused primer. I don't k ow if it's the primer or this setting spray but using them together keeps my make up on and looking fresh for 8 hours of work even when I'm outside sweating . I like it
customer_reviews.author: Krissy86

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. This works very well
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. This works very well. I live in an area where it's routinely 90-100 degrees outside and this really helps to keep my make up from melting off. Be careful to spray before putting on mascara though or it'll make the mascara smear if it's not water proof
customer_reviews.author: Overgirl830

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This spray works wonders! I can be out in the hot sun all day and my makeup still looks flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: One of the best setting sprays I have ever used and so affordable !
customer_reviews.author: bretahnedopar

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I got this item because I was on UTube and the women were using this item to keep your makeup looking fresh all day I mean stop your makeup from melting off your face so if you want to try something new and hip to the makeup game you should really try this product you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Mananagirl6

customer_reviews.title: ... the few times I used it my mascara did horrible things. I did use it according to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I applied it wrong but the few times I used it my mascara did horrible things. I did use it according to the instructions and every time it made my mascara yukky. So from now on I'll use it way before I apply my mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonn

customer_reviews.title: Great setting spray
customer_reviews.text: Great setting spray! I used it for my wedding day makeup. I used it three times while applying my makeup and it was great to help my makeup stay.
customer_reviews.author: icecream4god

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Smells terrible. NYX stuff is more tolerable and a better product with better spray cap.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: stay put
customer_reviews.text: I work in retail and my make up by the end of the night is gone. I got home and looked in the mirror and every single make up that I put on that day was still there. after spraying on e.l.f. make up mist and set from my eyeliner to my blush was still there yea.
customer_reviews.author: rena

customer_reviews.title: Nice dewy finish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff. I usually use urban decay setting spray in the moisturizing kind. This is very very similar to that finish nice and dewy. I do use color stay makeup too.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have in your make up bag!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a nice product to have for the price. Depending on your skin type, you may have to be extra diligent in your make up removal process though, and make sure your getting everywhere that this was sprayed - I missed a couple spots and had a major break out the next day. But with diligent and thorough make up removal, hasn't been a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: MittenousKitten666

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for my makeup or the appearance of it. I think it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: I don't see it
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell the difference with or without the spray.
customer_reviews.author: catdog

customer_reviews.title: The liquid is great. The spray nozzle is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The liquid is great. The spray nozzle is horrible. Would rather have a spray nozzle that delivers a fine mist. This one sprays splotches unless you spray far away from your face, in which case almost half the product ends up on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: moltabocca

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but maybe i haven't used it enough ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but maybe i haven't used it enough to really notice a huge difference. However, for the price i would recommend giving it a try. I will keep using it as I think its doing what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size for the price, but the smell is horrible. I dont see it working, because it doesn't set my makeup the was a setting spray should, and the smell makes everything worse. Overall, if your looking for something cheap, and if you don't mind the smell, than I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: fabely

customer_reviews.title: Great setting spray
customer_reviews.text: Great setting spray! does need a few mists to hold but after that it lasts all day and I can not worry about sweat or humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Vika

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful. I never realized how important setting spray was ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. I never realized how important setting spray was until using this. I have a bad habit of touching my face alot and smearing my makeup. After using the set spray I have no icky residue off my fingers and my makeup still looks amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have definitely noticed this helps keep my makeup on during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ludlow

customer_reviews.title: I'm totally in love with this mist and will but again
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally in love with this mist and will but again! I use it anytime I have a long day ahead and need my makeup to stay put a long time. I've gotten compliments on my makeup remaining flawless all day! Great setting spray. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne (AJ)

product_meta.title: e.l.f. Cosmetics Mist & Set Setting Spray, Hold Your Face and Eye Makeup in Place All Day, 2.02 fl. Ounces
product_meta.description: Our Mist and Set Setting Spray keeps your makeup in place all day. The lightweight, comfortable and alcohol-free formula improves makeup wearability and prevents color from running or fading. You can also spray it directly on your brush or sponge prior to makeup application for extended hold and vibrant color. e.l.f. Cosmetics offers a complete line of makeup and professional tools - all at an extreme value price, so there is sure to be something for everyone. See bullets and images for more information.
feature_bullets: KEEP MAKEUP FRESH ALL DAY - This Makeup Mist & Set Spray is designed to hold your face and eye makeup in place all day and to revitalize makeup color with just a few sprays.
LIGHTWEIGHT FINISHING SPRAY - Our refreshing formula contains aloe, green tea, cucumber, and vitamins A, C and E to soothe and hydrate the skin, while giving your makeup long lasting staying power.

HOW TO USE - Hold the bottle at arm’s length and spray a light layer of mist over your makeup, with eyes closed. Then let the fast-drying formula dry naturally. Apply throughout the day to freshen up your look.
INTENSIFY YOUR LOOK - Intensify any eyeshadow, eyeliner, or blush by spraying a little mist onto the makeup brush before applying.
VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE - Our cosmetics are PETA certified cruelty free and vegan, so you can feel good about using our products.
